summary: Santa is busy giving out gifts all across the world and the elves have all fallen asleep due to over work for Christmas. Now Mrs Claus is all alone and feeling very frisky...
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Mrs Claus
Author: Edhildil
12,24,2014
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

[font=Georgia]
[b][color=#cc0000][size=6]Merry Xmas![/size][/color][/b][/font]

Santa is busy giving out gifts all across the world and the elves have all fallen asleep due to over work for Christmas. Now

Mrs Claus is all alone and feeling very frisky...

This is a modular armor set based on my DMRA Oblivion body mods.You can wear the different pieces as you choose.

Location: See Screenshots. In a respawnable chest in the Riverwood Inn.

The world model for the armor pieces looks like a book, and acts like one. That means if you drop one of the items it will

look like a book and it will look like a book in your inventory. Why? Because it is funny.

Pieces include:

Bra
Bikini and Garter
Gloves
Jacket
Boots
Skirt
Hat

mods in screenshots include:

Hair: Apachii SkyHair female pack
Skin: Sporty Sexy Sweat, SG Textures Renewal CBBE
Eyes: The Eyes of Beauty

[youtube]deZaIOAjQVU[/youtube]

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]

If someone wants to convert this to Bodyslide 2 or another body type go for it. It would be nice to make it mod dependant

though so please keep that in mind. I have no idea how to use Outfit Studio.

[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game.(textures)



 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.



Uninstallation:

Delete Data_meshes_armor_edhildil_mrsclaus folder
Delete Data_textures_armor_edhildil_mrsclaus folder
Delete Edhildils Mrs Claus esp. file


[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
Edhildil for the armor
 

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also

be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
